argument.name: hpxml_path
argument.description: Absolute/relative path of the HPXML file.

argument.name: weather_dir
argument.description: Absolute/relative path of the weather directory.

argument.name: simulation_control_timestep
argument.description: Value must be a divisor of 60.

argument.name: simulation_control_begin_month
argument.display_name: Simulation Control: Run Period Begin Month
argument.description: This numeric field should contain the starting month number (1 = January, 2 = February, etc.) for the annual run period desired.

argument.name: simulation_control_begin_day_of_month
argument.display_name: Simulation Control: Run Period Begin Day of Month
argument.description: This numeric field should contain the starting day of the starting month (must be valid for month) for the annual run period desired.

argument.name: simulation_control_end_month
argument.display_name: Simulation Control: Run Period End Month
argument.description: This numeric field should contain the end month number (1 = January, 2 = February, etc.) for the annual run period desired.

argument.name: simulation_control_end_day_of_month
argument.display_name: Simulation Control: Run Period End Day of Month
argument.description: This numeric field should contain the ending day of the ending month (must be valid for month) for the annual run period desired.

argument.name: schedules_output_path
argument.description: Absolute (or relative) path of the output schedules file.

argument.name: weather_station_epw_filename
argument.description: Name of the EPW file.

argument.name: geometry_unit_type
argument.description: The type of unit.

argument.name: geometry_unit_multiplier
argument.description: The number of actual units this single unit represents.

argument.name: geometry_num_units
argument.description: The number of units in the building. This is only required for single-family attached, 2-4 unit building, and 5+ unit building buildings.

argument.name: geometry_cfa
argument.description: The total floor area of the conditioned space (including any conditioned basement floor area).

argument.name: geometry_num_floors_above_grade
argument.description: The number of floors above grade (in the unit if single-family, and in the building if multifamily).

argument.name: geometry_wall_height
argument.description: The average height of the walls.

argument.name: geometry_orientation
argument.description: The house's orientation is measured clockwise from due south when viewed from above (e.g., North=0, East=90, South=180, West=270).

argument.name: geometry_aspect_ratio
argument.description: The ratio of the front/back wall length to the left/right wall length, excluding any protruding garage wall area.

argument.name: geometry_level
argument.description: The level of the unit.

argument.name: geometry_horizontal_location
argument.description: The horizontal location of the unit when viewing the front of the building.

argument.name: geometry_corridor_position
argument.description: The position of the corridor.

argument.name: geometry_corridor_width
argument.description: The width of the corridor.

argument.name: geometry_inset_width
argument.description: The width of the inset.

argument.name: geometry_inset_depth
argument.description: The depth of the inset.

argument.name: geometry_inset_position
argument.description: The position of the inset.

argument.name: geometry_balcony_depth
argument.description: The depth of the balcony.

argument.name: geometry_garage_width
argument.description: The width of the garage. Enter zero for no garage.

argument.name: geometry_garage_depth
argument.description: The depth of the garage.

argument.name: geometry_garage_protrusion
argument.description: The fraction of the garage that is protruding from the living space.

argument.name: geometry_garage_position
argument.description: The position of the garage.

argument.name: geometry_foundation_type
argument.description: The foundation type of the building.

argument.name: geometry_foundation_height
argument.description: The height of the foundation (e.g., 3ft for crawlspace, 8ft for basement). Only applies to basements/crawlspaces.

argument.name: geometry_foundation_height_above_grade
argument.description: The depth above grade of the foundation wall. Only applies to basements/crawlspaces.

argument.name: geometry_roof_type
argument.description: The roof type of the building.

argument.name: geometry_roof_pitch
argument.description: The roof pitch of the attic. Ignored if the building has a flat roof.

argument.name: geometry_roof_structure
argument.description: The roof structure of the building. Ignored if the building has a flat roof.

argument.name: geometry_attic_type
argument.description: The attic type of the building. Ignored if the building has a flat roof.

argument.name: geometry_eaves_depth
argument.description: The eaves depth of the roof.

argument.name: geometry_num_bedrooms
argument.description: Specify the number of bedrooms. Used to determine the energy usage of appliances and plug loads, hot water usage, etc.

argument.name: geometry_num_bathrooms
argument.description: Specify the number of bathrooms.

argument.name: geometry_num_occupants
argument.description: Specify the number of occupants. A value of 'auto' will calculate the average number of occupants from the number of bedrooms. Used to specify the internal gains from people only.

argument.name: floor_assembly_r
argument.description: Assembly R-value for the floor (foundation ceiling). Ignored if a slab foundation.

argument.name: foundation_wall_insulation_r
argument.description: Nominal R-value for the foundation wall insulation. Only applies to basements/crawlspaces.

argument.name: foundation_wall_insulation_distance_to_top
argument.display_name: Foundation: Wall Insulation Distance To Top
argument.description: The distance from the top of the foundation wall to the top of the foundation wall insulation. Only applies to basements/crawlspaces.

argument.name: foundation_wall_insulation_distance_to_bottom
argument.display_name: Foundation: Wall Insulation Distance To Bottom
argument.description: The distance from the top of the foundation wall to the bottom of the foundation wall insulation. Only applies to basements/crawlspaces.

argument.name: foundation_wall_assembly_r
argument.description: Assembly R-value for the foundation walls. Only applies to basements/crawlspaces. If provided, overrides the previous foundation wall insulation inputs.

argument.name: slab_perimeter_insulation_r
argument.description: Nominal R-value of the vertical slab perimeter insulation. Applies to slab-on-grade foundations and basement/crawlspace floors.

argument.name: slab_perimeter_depth
argument.description: Depth from grade to bottom of vertical slab perimeter insulation. Applies to slab-on-grade foundations and basement/crawlspace floors.

argument.name: slab_under_insulation_r
argument.display_name: Slab: Under Slab Insulation Nominal R-value
argument.description: Nominal R-value of the horizontal under slab insulation. Applies to slab-on-grade foundations and basement/crawlspace floors.

argument.name: slab_under_width
argument.description: Width from slab edge inward of horizontal under-slab insulation. Enter 999 to specify that the under slab insulation spans the entire slab. Applies to slab-on-grade foundations and basement/crawlspace floors.

argument.name: slab_carpet_fraction
argument.description: Fraction of the slab floor area that is carpeted.

argument.name: slab_carpet_r
argument.description: R-value of the slab carpet.

argument.name: ceiling_assembly_r
argument.description: Assembly R-value for the ceiling (attic floor).

argument.name: roof_assembly_r
argument.description: Assembly R-value of the roof.

argument.name: roof_solar_absorptance
argument.description: The solar absorptance of the roof.

argument.name: roof_emittance
argument.description: The emittance of the roof.

argument.name: roof_radiant_barrier
argument.description: Specifies whether the attic has a radiant barrier.

argument.name: neighbor_front_distance
argument.description: The minimum distance between the simulated house and the neighboring house to the front (not including eaves). A value of zero indicates no neighbors.

argument.name: neighbor_back_distance
argument.description: The minimum distance between the simulated house and the neighboring house to the back (not including eaves). A value of zero indicates no neighbors.

argument.name: neighbor_left_distance
argument.description: The minimum distance between the simulated house and the neighboring house to the left (not including eaves). A value of zero indicates no neighbors.

argument.name: neighbor_right_distance
argument.description: The minimum distance between the simulated house and the neighboring house to the right (not including eaves). A value of zero indicates no neighbors.

argument.name: neighbor_front_height
argument.description: The height of the neighboring building to the front. A value of 'auto' will use the same height as this building.

argument.name: neighbor_back_height
argument.description: The height of the neighboring building to the back. A value of 'auto' will use the same height as this building.

argument.name: neighbor_left_height
argument.description: The height of the neighboring building to the left. A value of 'auto' will use the same height as this building.

argument.name: neighbor_right_height
argument.description: The height of the neighboring building to the right. A value of 'auto' will use the same height as this building.

argument.name: wall_type
argument.description: The type of exterior walls.

argument.name: wall_assembly_r
argument.description: Assembly R-value of the exterior walls.

argument.name: wall_solar_absorptance
argument.description: The solar absorptance of the exterior walls.

argument.name: wall_emittance
argument.description: The emittance of the exterior walls.

argument.name: window_front_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's front facade. Enter 0 if specifying Front Window Area instead.

argument.name: window_back_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's back facade. Enter 0 if specifying Back Window Area instead.

argument.name: window_left_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's left facade. Enter 0 if specifying Left Window Area instead.

argument.name: window_right_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's right facade. Enter 0 if specifying Right Window Area instead.

argument.name: window_area_front
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's front facade. Enter 0 if specifying Front Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: window_area_back
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's back facade. Enter 0 if specifying Back Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: window_area_left
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's left facade. Enter 0 if specifying Left Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: window_area_right
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's right facade. Enter 0 if specifying Right Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: window_aspect_ratio
argument.description: Ratio of window height to width.

argument.name: window_fraction_of_operable_area
argument.description: Fraction of operable window area.

argument.name: window_ufactor
argument.description: The heat transfer coefficient of the windows.

argument.name: window_shgc
argument.description: The ratio of solar heat gain through a glazing system compared to that of an unobstructed opening, for windows.

argument.name: window_interior_shading_winter
argument.description: Interior shading multiplier for the heating season. 1.0 indicates no reduction in solar gain, 0.85 indicates 15% reduction, etc.

argument.name: window_interior_shading_summer
argument.description: Interior shading multiplier for the cooling season. 1.0 indicates no reduction in solar gain, 0.85 indicates 15% reduction, etc.

argument.name: overhangs_front_depth
argument.description: Specifies the depth of overhangs for windows on the front facade.

argument.name: overhangs_front_distance_to_top_of_window
argument.display_name: Overhangs: Front Facade Distance to Top of Window
argument.description: Specifies the distance to the top of window of overhangs for windows on the front facade.

argument.name: overhangs_back_depth
argument.description: Specifies the depth of overhangs for windows on the back facade.

argument.name: overhangs_back_distance_to_top_of_window
argument.display_name: Overhangs: Back Facade Distance to Top of Window
argument.description: Specifies the distance to the top of window of overhangs for windows on the back facade.

argument.name: overhangs_left_depth
argument.description: Specifies the depth of overhangs for windows on the left facade.

argument.name: overhangs_left_distance_to_top_of_window
argument.display_name: Overhangs: Left Facade Distance to Top of Window
argument.description: Specifies the distance to the top of window of overhangs for windows on the left facade.

argument.name: overhangs_right_depth
argument.description: Specifies the depth of overhangs for windows on the right facade.

argument.name: overhangs_right_distance_to_top_of_window
argument.display_name: Overhangs: Right Facade Distance to Top of Window
argument.description: Specifies the distance to the top of window of overhangs for windows on the right facade.

argument.name: skylight_area_front
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's front conditioned roof facade.

argument.name: skylight_area_back
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's back conditioned roof facade.

argument.name: skylight_area_left
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's left conditioned roof facade.

argument.name: skylight_area_right
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's right conditioned roof facade.

argument.name: skylight_ufactor
argument.description: The heat transfer coefficient of the skylights.

argument.name: skylight_shgc
argument.description: The ratio of solar heat gain through a glazing system compared to that of an unobstructed opening, for skylights.

argument.name: door_area
argument.description: The area of the opaque door(s).

argument.name: door_rvalue
argument.description: R-value of the doors.

argument.name: air_leakage_units
argument.description: The unit of measure for the above-grade living air leakage.

argument.name: air_leakage_value
argument.description: Air exchange rate, in ACH or CFM at 50 Pascals.

argument.name: air_leakage_shelter_coefficient
argument.description: The local shelter coefficient (AIM-2 infiltration model) accounts for nearby buildings, trees, and obstructions.

argument.name: heating_system_type
argument.description: The type of the heating system.

argument.name: heating_system_fuel
argument.description: The fuel type of the heating system. Ignored for ElectricResistance.

argument.name: heating_system_heating_efficiency_afue
argument.description: The rated efficiency value of the Furnace/WallFurnace/Boiler heating system.

argument.name: heating_system_heating_efficiency_percent
argument.description: The rated efficiency value of the ElectricResistance/Stove/PortableHeater heating system.

argument.name: heating_system_heating_capacity
argument.description: The output heating capacity of the heating system. If using 'auto', the autosizing algorithm will use ACCA Manual S to set the capacity.

argument.name: heating_system_fraction_heat_load_served
argument.display_name: Heating System: Fraction Heat Load Served
argument.description: The heat load served fraction of the heating system.

argument.name: heating_system_electric_auxiliary_energy
argument.description: The electric auxiliary energy of the heating system.

argument.name: cooling_system_type
argument.description: The type of the cooling system.

argument.name: cooling_system_cooling_efficiency_seer
argument.description: The rated efficiency value of the central air conditioner cooling system. Ignored for evaporative cooler.

argument.name: cooling_system_cooling_efficiency_eer
argument.description: The rated efficiency value of the room air conditioner cooling system. Ignored for evaporative cooler.

argument.name: cooling_system_cooling_compressor_type
argument.description: The compressor type of the cooling system. Only applies to central air conditioner.

argument.name: cooling_system_cooling_sensible_heat_fraction
argument.display_name: Cooling System: Cooling Sensible Heat Fraction
argument.description: The sensible heat fraction of the cooling system. Ignored for evaporative cooler.

argument.name: cooling_system_cooling_capacity
argument.description: The output cooling capacity of the cooling system. If using 'auto', the autosizing algorithm will use ACCA Manual S to set the capacity. Ignored for evaporative cooler.

argument.name: cooling_system_fraction_cool_load_served
argument.display_name: Cooling System: Fraction Cool Load Served
argument.description: The cool load served fraction of the cooling system.

argument.name: cooling_system_evap_cooler_is_ducted
argument.display_name: Cooling System: Evaporative Cooler Is Ducted
argument.description: Whether the evaporative cooler is ducted or not.

argument.name: heat_pump_type
argument.description: The type of the heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_heating_efficiency_hspf
argument.description: The rated heating efficiency value of the air-to-air/mini-split heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_heating_efficiency_cop
argument.description: The rated heating efficiency value of the ground-to-air heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_cooling_efficiency_seer
argument.description: The rated cooling efficiency value of the air-to-air/mini-split heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_cooling_efficiency_eer
argument.description: The rated cooling efficiency value of the ground-to-air heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_cooling_compressor_type
argument.description: The compressor type of the heat pump. Only applies to air-to-air and mini-split.

argument.name: heat_pump_cooling_sensible_heat_fraction
argument.display_name: Heat Pump: Cooling Sensible Heat Fraction
argument.description: The sensible heat fraction of the heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_heating_capacity
argument.description: The output heating capacity of the heat pump. If using 'auto', the autosizing algorithm will use ACCA Manual S to set the capacity.

argument.name: heat_pump_heating_capacity_17F
argument.description: The output heating capacity of the heat pump at 17F. If using 'auto', the autosizing algorithm will use ACCA Manual S to set the capacity. Only applies to air-to-air and mini-split.

argument.name: heat_pump_cooling_capacity
argument.description: The output cooling capacity of the heat pump. If using 'auto', the autosizing algorithm will use ACCA Manual S to set the capacity.

argument.name: heat_pump_fraction_heat_load_served
argument.display_name: Heat Pump: Fraction Heat Load Served
argument.description: The heat load served fraction of the heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_fraction_cool_load_served
argument.display_name: Heat Pump: Fraction Cool Load Served
argument.description: The cool load served fraction of the heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_backup_fuel
argument.description: The backup fuel type of the heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_backup_heating_efficiency
argument.description: The backup rated efficiency value of the heat pump. Percent for electricity fuel type. AFUE otherwise.

argument.name: heat_pump_backup_heating_capacity
argument.description: The backup output heating capacity of the heat pump. If using 'auto', the autosizing algorithm will use ACCA Manual S to set the capacity.

argument.name: heat_pump_backup_heating_switchover_temp
argument.display_name: Heat Pump: Backup Heating Switchover Temperature
argument.description: The temperature at which the heat pump stops operating and the backup heating system starts running. Only applies to air-to-air and mini-split.

argument.name: heat_pump_mini_split_is_ducted
argument.description: Whether the mini-split heat pump is ducted or not.

argument.name: setpoint_heating_temp
argument.description: Specify the heating setpoint temperature.

argument.name: setpoint_heating_setback_temp
argument.description: Specify the heating setback temperature.

argument.name: setpoint_heating_setback_hours_per_week
argument.display_name: Setpoint: Heating Setback Hours per Week
argument.description: Specify the heating setback number of hours per week value.

argument.name: setpoint_heating_setback_start_hour
argument.description: Specify the heating setback start hour value. 0 = midnight, 12 = noon

argument.name: setpoint_cooling_temp
argument.description: Specify the cooling setpoint temperature.

argument.name: setpoint_cooling_setup_temp
argument.description: Specify the cooling setup temperature.

argument.name: setpoint_cooling_setup_hours_per_week
argument.display_name: Setpoint: Cooling Setup Hours per Week
argument.description: Specify the cooling setup number of hours per week value.

argument.name: setpoint_cooling_setup_start_hour
argument.description: Specify the cooling setup start hour value. 0 = midnight, 12 = noon

argument.name: ducts_supply_leakage_units
argument.description: The leakage units of the supply ducts.

argument.name: ducts_return_leakage_units
argument.description: The leakage units of the return ducts.

argument.name: ducts_supply_leakage_value
argument.description: The leakage value to outside of the supply ducts.

argument.name: ducts_return_leakage_value
argument.description: The leakage value to outside of the return ducts.

argument.name: ducts_supply_insulation_r
argument.description: The insulation r-value of the supply ducts.

argument.name: ducts_return_insulation_r
argument.description: The insulation r-value of the return ducts.

argument.name: ducts_supply_location
argument.description: The location of the supply ducts.

argument.name: ducts_return_location
argument.description: The location of the return ducts.

argument.name: ducts_supply_surface_area
argument.description: The surface area of the supply ducts.

argument.name: ducts_return_surface_area
argument.description: The surface area of the return ducts.

argument.name: mech_vent_fan_type
argument.description: The fan type of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_flow_rate
argument.description: The flow rate of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_hours_in_operation
argument.description: The hours in operation of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_total_recovery_efficiency_type
argument.display_name: Mechanical Ventilation: Total Recovery Efficiency Type
argument.description: The total recovery efficiency type of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_total_recovery_efficiency
argument.description: The Unadjusted or Adjusted total recovery efficiency of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_sensible_recovery_efficiency_type
argument.display_name: Mechanical Ventilation: Sensible Recovery Efficiency Type
argument.description: The sensible recovery efficiency type of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_sensible_recovery_efficiency
argument.description: The Unadjusted or Adjusted sensible recovery efficiency of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_fan_power
argument.description: The fan power of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: kitchen_fan_present
argument.description: Whether there is a kitchen fan.

argument.name: kitchen_fan_flow_rate
argument.description: The flow rate of the kitchen fan.

argument.name: kitchen_fan_hours_in_operation
argument.description: The hours in operation of the kitchen fan.

argument.name: kitchen_fan_power
argument.description: The fan power of the kitchen fan.

argument.name: kitchen_fan_start_hour
argument.description: The start hour of the kitchen fan.

argument.name: bathroom_fans_present
argument.description: Whether there are bathroom fans.

argument.name: bathroom_fans_flow_rate
argument.description: The flow rate of the bathroom fans.

argument.name: bathroom_fans_hours_in_operation
argument.description: The hours in operation of the bathroom fans.

argument.name: bathroom_fans_power
argument.description: The fan power of the bathroom fans.

argument.name: bathroom_fans_start_hour
argument.description: The start hour of the bathroom fans.

argument.name: bathroom_fans_quantity
argument.description: The quantity of the bathroom fans.

argument.name: whole_house_fan_present
argument.description: Whether there is a whole house fan.

argument.name: whole_house_fan_flow_rate
argument.description: The flow rate of the whole house fan.

argument.name: whole_house_fan_power
argument.description: The fan power of the whole house fan.

argument.name: water_heater_type
argument.description: The type of water heater.

argument.name: water_heater_fuel_type
argument.description: The fuel type of water heater. Ignored for heat pump water heater.

argument.name: water_heater_location
argument.description: The location of water heater.

argument.name: water_heater_tank_volume
argument.description: Nominal volume of water heater tank. Set to auto to have volume autosized. Only applies to storage water heater, heat pump water heater, and space-heating boiler with storage tank.

argument.name: water_heater_heating_capacity
argument.description: The maximum energy input rating of water heater. Set to auto to have this field autosized. Only applies to storage water heater.

argument.name: water_heater_efficiency_type
argument.description: The efficiency type of water heater. Does not apply to space-heating boilers.

argument.name: water_heater_efficiency_ef
argument.description: Ratio of useful energy output from water heater to the total amount of energy delivered from the water heater.

argument.name: water_heater_efficiency_uef
argument.description: The uniform energy factor of water heater. Does not apply to space-heating boilers.

argument.name: water_heater_recovery_efficiency
argument.description: Ratio of energy delivered to water heater to the energy content of the fuel consumed by the water heater. Only used for non-electric storage water heaters.

argument.name: water_heater_standby_loss
argument.description: The standby loss of water heater. Only applies to space-heating boilers.

argument.name: water_heater_jacket_rvalue
argument.description: The jacket R-value of water heater. Doesn't apply to instantaneous water heater or space-heating boiler with tankless coil.

argument.name: water_heater_setpoint_temperature
argument.description: The setpoint temperature of water heater.

argument.name: dhw_distribution_system_type
argument.description: The type of the hot water distribution system.

argument.name: dhw_distribution_standard_piping_length
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Standard Piping Length
argument.description: If the distribution system is Standard, the length of the piping. A value of 'auto' will use a default.

argument.name: dhw_distribution_recirc_control_type
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Recirculation Control Type
argument.description: If the distribution system is Recirculation, the type of hot water recirculation control, if any.

argument.name: dhw_distribution_recirc_piping_length
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Recirculation Piping Length
argument.description: If the distribution system is Recirculation, the length of the recirculation piping.

argument.name: dhw_distribution_recirc_branch_piping_length
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Recirculation Branch Piping Length
argument.description: If the distribution system is Recirculation, the length of the recirculation branch piping.

argument.name: dhw_distribution_recirc_pump_power
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Recirculation Pump Power
argument.description: If the distribution system is Recirculation, the recirculation pump power.

argument.name: dhw_distribution_pipe_r
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Pipe Insulation Nominal R-Value
argument.description: Nominal R-value of the pipe insulation.

argument.name: dwhr_facilities_connected
argument.display_name: Drain Water Heat Recovery: Facilities Connected
argument.description: Which facilities are connected for the drain water heat recovery.

argument.name: dwhr_equal_flow
argument.display_name: Drain Water Heat Recovery: Equal Flow
argument.description: Whether the drain water heat recovery has equal flow.

argument.name: dwhr_efficiency
argument.description: The efficiency of the drain water heat recovery.

argument.name: water_fixtures_shower_low_flow
argument.display_name: Hot Water Fixtures: Is Shower Low Flow
argument.description: Whether the shower fixture is low flow.

argument.name: water_fixtures_sink_low_flow
argument.display_name: Hot Water Fixtures: Is Sink Low Flow
argument.description: Whether the sink fixture is low flow.

argument.name: water_fixtures_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on the hot water usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.

argument.name: solar_thermal_system_type
argument.description: The type of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_area
argument.description: The collector area of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_loop_type
argument.description: The collector loop type of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_type
argument.description: The collector type of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_azimuth
argument.description: The collector azimuth of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_tilt
argument.description: The collector tilt of the solar thermal system. Can also enter, e.g., RoofPitch, RoofPitch+20, Latitude, Latitude-15, etc.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_rated_optical_efficiency
argument.display_name: Solar Thermal: Collector Rated Optical Efficiency
argument.description: The collector rated optical efficiency of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_rated_thermal_losses
argument.display_name: Solar Thermal: Collector Rated Thermal Losses
argument.description: The collector rated thermal losses of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_storage_volume
argument.description: The storage volume of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_solar_fraction
argument.description: The solar fraction of the solar thermal system. If provided, overrides all other solar thermal inputs.

argument.name: pv_system_module_type_1
argument.description: Module type of the PV system 1.

argument.name: pv_system_location_1
argument.description: Location of the PV system 1.

argument.name: pv_system_tracking_1
argument.description: Tracking of the PV system 1.

argument.name: pv_system_array_azimuth_1
argument.description: Array azimuth of the PV system 1.

argument.name: pv_system_array_tilt_1
argument.description: Array tilt of the PV system 1. Can also enter, e.g., RoofPitch, RoofPitch+20, Latitude, Latitude-15, etc.

argument.name: pv_system_max_power_output_1
argument.description: Maximum power output of the PV system 1.

argument.name: pv_system_inverter_efficiency_1
argument.description: Inverter efficiency of the PV system 1.

argument.name: pv_system_system_losses_fraction_1
argument.description: System losses fraction of the PV system 1.

argument.name: pv_system_module_type_2
argument.description: Module type of the PV system 2.

argument.name: pv_system_location_2
argument.description: Location of the PV system 2.

argument.name: pv_system_tracking_2
argument.description: Tracking of the PV system 2.

argument.name: pv_system_array_azimuth_2
argument.description: Array azimuth of the PV system 2.

argument.name: pv_system_array_tilt_2
argument.description: Array tilt of the PV system 2. Can also enter, e.g., RoofPitch, RoofPitch+20, Latitude, Latitude-15, etc.

argument.name: pv_system_max_power_output_2
argument.description: Maximum power output of the PV system 2.

argument.name: pv_system_inverter_efficiency_2
argument.description: Inverter efficiency of the PV system 2.

argument.name: pv_system_system_losses_fraction_2
argument.description: System losses fraction of the PV system 2.

argument.name: lighting_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on the energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.

argument.name: clothes_washer_present
argument.description: Whether there is a clothes washer.

argument.name: clothes_washer_location
argument.description: The space type for the clothes washer location.

argument.name: clothes_washer_efficiency_type
argument.description: The efficiency type of clothes washer.

argument.name: clothes_washer_efficiency_mef
argument.description: The Modified Energy Factor (MEF) is the capacity of the clothes container divided by the total clothes washer energy consumption per cycle, where the energy consumption is the sum of the machine electrical energy consumption, the hot water energy consumption, the energy required for removal of the remaining moisture in the wash load, standby energy, and off-mode energy consumption.

argument.name: clothes_washer_efficiency_imef
argument.display_name: Clothes Washer: Integrated Modified Energy Factor
argument.description: The energy performance metric for ENERGY STAR certified residential clothes washers as of March 7, 2015.

argument.name: clothes_washer_rated_annual_kwh
argument.description: The annual energy consumed by the clothes washer, as rated, obtained from the EnergyGuide label. This includes both the appliance electricity consumption and the energy required for water heating.

argument.name: clothes_washer_label_electric_rate
argument.description: The annual energy consumed by the clothes washer, as rated, obtained from the EnergyGuide label. This includes both the appliance electricity consumption and the energy required for water heating.

argument.name: clothes_washer_label_gas_rate
argument.description: The annual energy consumed by the clothes washer, as rated, obtained from the EnergyGuide label. This includes both the appliance electricity consumption and the energy required for water heating.

argument.name: clothes_washer_label_annual_gas_cost
argument.display_name: Clothes Washer: Label Annual Cost with Gas DHW
argument.description: The annual cost of using the system under test conditions. Input is obtained from the EnergyGuide label.

argument.name: clothes_washer_label_usage
argument.description: The clothes washer loads per week.

argument.name: clothes_washer_capacity
argument.description: Volume of the washer drum. Obtained from the EnergyStar website or the manufacturer's literature.

argument.name: clothes_washer_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on the energy and hot water usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_present
argument.description: Whether there is a clothes dryer.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_location
argument.description: The space type for the clothes dryer location.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_fuel_type
argument.description: Type of fuel used by the clothes dryer.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_efficiency_type
argument.description: The efficiency type of clothes dryer.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_efficiency_ef
argument.description: The energy performance metric for ENERGY STAR certified residential clothes dryers prior to September 13, 2013. The new metric is Combined Energy Factor.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_efficiency_cef
argument.description: The Combined Energy Factor (CEF) measures the pounds of clothing that can be dried per kWh (Fuel equivalent) of electricity, including energy consumed during Stand-by and Off modes.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_control_type
argument.description: Type of control used by the clothes dryer.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on the energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.

argument.name: dishwasher_present
argument.description: Whether there is a dishwasher.

argument.name: dishwasher_efficiency_type
argument.description: The efficiency type of dishwasher.

argument.name: dishwasher_efficiency_kwh
argument.description: The rated annual kWh of the dishwasher.

argument.name: dishwasher_efficiency_ef
argument.description: The energy factor of the dishwasher.

argument.name: dishwasher_label_electric_rate
argument.description: The label electric rate of the dishwasher.

argument.name: dishwasher_label_gas_rate
argument.description: The label gas rate of the dishwasher.

argument.name: dishwasher_label_annual_gas_cost
argument.description: The label annual gas cost of the dishwasher.

argument.name: dishwasher_label_usage
argument.description: The dishwasher loads per week.

argument.name: dishwasher_place_setting_capacity
argument.description: The number of place settings for the unit. Data obtained from manufacturer's literature.

argument.name: dishwasher_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on the energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.

argument.name: refrigerator_present
argument.description: Whether there is a refrigerator.

argument.name: refrigerator_location
argument.description: The space type for the refrigerator location.

argument.name: refrigerator_rated_annual_kwh
argument.description: The EnergyGuide rated annual energy consumption for a refrigerator.

argument.name: refrigerator_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on the energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.

argument.name: cooking_range_oven_present
argument.description: Whether there is a cooking range/oven.

argument.name: cooking_range_oven_fuel_type
argument.description: Type of fuel used by the cooking range/oven.

argument.name: cooking_range_oven_is_induction
argument.description: Whether the cooking range is induction.

argument.name: cooking_range_oven_is_convection
argument.description: Whether the oven is convection.

argument.name: cooking_range_oven_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on the energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.

argument.name: ceiling_fan_efficiency
argument.description: The efficiency rating of the ceiling fan(s) at medium speed.

argument.name: ceiling_fan_quantity
argument.description: Total number of ceiling fans.

argument.name: ceiling_fan_cooling_setpoint_temp_offset
argument.display_name: Ceiling Fan: Cooling Setpoint Temperature Offset
argument.description: The setpoint temperature offset during cooling season for the ceiling fan(s). Only applies if ceiling fan quantity is greater than zero.

argument.name: plug_loads_television_annual_kwh
argument.description: The annual energy consumption of the television plug loads.

argument.name: plug_loads_other_annual_kwh
argument.description: The annual energy consumption of the other residual plug loads.

argument.name: plug_loads_other_frac_sensible
argument.description: Fraction of other residual plug loads' internal gains that are sensible.

argument.name: plug_loads_other_frac_latent
argument.description: Fraction of other residual plug loads' internal gains that are latent.

argument.name: plug_loads_schedule_values
argument.description: Whether to use the schedule values.

argument.name: plug_loads_weekday_fractions
argument.description: Specify the 24-hour weekday schedule.

argument.name: plug_loads_weekend_fractions
argument.description: Specify the 24-hour weekend schedule.

argument.name: plug_loads_monthly_multipliers
argument.description: Specify the 12-month schedule.

argument.name: plug_loads_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on the energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.
